NAME: NAME
API_PATHS.text: The following details each of them.
section.contact.body: Any question, comments or request related to this API document should be addressed to :
section.headers.body: This section includes common HTTP Headers to be included in the incoming requests.
section.serverlist.body: This API end-points are accessible via the following URL(s). Please append any API path to the desired server URL to build a valid request path.
section.response.body: This paragraph details main status codes and content as a response to the ##${path}## path.
endpoint.info.1: This end-point requires various parameter types to be provided by the caller.
endpoint.info.2: This end-point requires Header Parameter(s) to be provided by the caller.
endpoint.info.3: This end-point requires Query (s) to be provided by the caller.
endpoint.info.4: This end-point requires Path Parameter(s) to be provided by the caller.
endpoint.info.5: This end-point requires some input in its body to be provided by the caller.
requestType.info: The request body is expected to be of type : ##${type}## which is detailed in 'SCHEMA TYPES' section
request.body.example.intro: The following is a request body example
response.body.example.intro: The following is a response body example
